Package eu.mihosoft.freerouting.datastructures

Class ShapeTree

java.lang.Object
eu.mihosoft.freerouting.datastructures.ShapeTree
Direct Known Subclasses:
MinAreaTree
public abstract class ShapeTree extends Object
Abstract binary search tree for shapes in the plane. The shapes are stored in the leafs of the tree. Objects to be stored in the tree must implement the interface ShapeTree.Storable.

  • Nested Class Summary

    Nested Classes
    Modifier and Type
    Class
    Description
    static class 
    ShapeTree.InnerNode
    Desscription of an inner node of the tree, which implements a fork to its two children.
    static class 
    ShapeTree.Leaf
    Description of a leaf of the Tree, where the geometric information is stored.
    static interface 
    ShapeTree.Storable
    Interface, which must be implemented by objects to be stored in a ShapeTree.
    static class 
    ShapeTree.TreeEntry
    Information of a single object stored in a tree
    protected static class 
    ShapeTree.TreeNode
    Common functionality of inner nodes and leaf nodes.
